short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your Quizlet flashcards into Anki decks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your Quizlet flashcards into Anki decks.

You can view the source code on GitHub at github.com/aboutdavid/quizlet2anki. Licensed under AGPL 3.0

Steps to download a flashcard set:
1. Go to any flash card set. 
2. Click on the extension as a popup. Review the details and download it!
3. Import it!
- On Anki desktop click "Import File".
- AnkiDroid click the 3 dots at the top-right, clicking "Import" , then "Deck Package (.apkg)"
